Homepage.description: I'm a full-stack developer and I'm currently halfway through my degree in Systems Engineering. I specialize in JavaScript and frameworks like React and Next.js to build scalable and efficient solutions, but I'm studying to improve both my front and backend skills.
Homepage.title: Fullstack web developer
Homepage.name: Santiago Riera

PingPanda.description: Pingpanda is a SaaS that allows you to receive real-time notifications via Discord when an event happens in your application. Authentication with Clerk Auth. Payments integrated with Stripe.

CaseCobra.description: Create your own custom phone case with your own images. Stripe payment integration. User authentication with Kinde Auth. Admin dashboard to manage orders and products.

DigitalHippo.description: Marketplace for digital products. You can buy or upload and sell your products. Backend implementation with Payload CMS. Stripe payment integration. Admin dashboard to manage orders and products.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a software developer with experience in web development. I have worked with technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, TailwindCSS, and Next.js. I am passionate about learning new technologies and improving my skills. I am a flexible person with good communication and teamwork skills, always willing to learn. I quickly adapt to changes and easily acquire new skills.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: I worked for a year at a local company, starting with a training period that helped me develop my skills. Once I joined my role, I focused on updating React components to improve functionality and user experience. Additionally, I built websites using WordPress, applying my web development knowledge. This experience was invaluable in helping me refine my technical skills and learn how to effectively collaborate with a team on various projects.

education.title: Education
education.description: I am a student of Systems Engineering at the National Technological University (Córdoba), where I am developing a solid foundation in programming and software development principles. Additionally, I have taken several online courses in web development and programming to enhance my skills. Some of these courses include:

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: In addition to my technical skills, I possess interpersonal abilities that enhance my teamwork. I excel at effective communication, enabling me to clearly express ideas and facilitate collaboration with colleagues and clients. I approach challenges with an analytical mindset, seeking creative and efficient solutions, and quickly adapt to new situations and feedback. I value collaboration and the contributions of others, fostering a positive and productive environment. These are my main technical skills and areas of expertise:

html.description: Proficient in writing semantic HTML5, ensuring accessibility and SEO-friendly structure.

css.description: Skilled in modern CSS3 techniques, including Flexbox and Grid for responsive layouts.

javascript.description: Proficient in writing clean, modular, and maintainable JavaScript code.

react.description: Experienced in building dynamic single-page applications (SPAs) using React, including hooks, context, and component-based architecture.

nextjs.description: Expertise in server-side rendering (SSR) and building scalable, performant web applications with Next.js.

tailwind.description: Skilled in creating highly responsive, custom designs quickly with Tailwind's utility-first CSS framework.

express.description: Basic knowledge in developing RESTful APIs and backend services using Node.js and Express for scalable and performant applications.

typescript.description: Basic understanding of TypeScript and its use for adding static types to JavaScript, improving code reliability.

sql.description: Knowledge in working with relational databases (SQL) for data management and storage.

postgresql.description: Basic knowledge in working with PostgreSQL for data management and storage using Neon Serverless Postrges.

Contact.title: Let's Work Together
Contact.subtitle: Whether you're interested in my profile, have a project in mind, or just want to chat, I'm here to help. Let's connect!
